title: (((Harvard Sq Charming 1 Bed 1 Bath))) 9/1
posting_body: ['Apartment Rental Experts - Porter Square', 'Classic 1 Bed - Harvard Square - Heat & Hot Water Included', 'Cambridge / Harvard Square / Porter Square', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#171523', 'Apartment Summary', 'In one of most beautiful pre-war brick condo buildings around Harvard Square.', ' Literally across the street from Law School and steps to Cambridge Common and the Redline at Harvard Square.', ' Beautiful hardwood floors, extra-high ceilings, pristine tile bathroom with older style finish in perfect shape.', ' Walk in closet in bedroom with built in storage + extra deep coat closet in entry hall + large pantry with build in wire shelving.', ' Floor to ceiling built in book shelves in living room.', ' Ceiling fans in living room + bedroom.', ' Coin op laundry in basement and the building has elevator, so super easy access to laundry, and basement area is immaculate.', ' A gem.', '  (Reference #171523)', 'Apartment Details', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Kitchen:', 'Galley.', ' Appliances include:  Refrigerator, Natural Gas Stove.', 'Bath:', '1', 'Location:', 'Cambridge/Harvard Square', 'Bedrooms:', '1', 'Reference:', '#171523', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Features', 'Small Building structure, Brick architecture, on the 2nd floor, 600 square feet.', '5 minute walk to the T.', 'Permit Street Parking.', 'Coin-op washer in basement, Coin-op dryer in basement, Cable Ready.', 'Contact Information', 'Agent:', 'Margarita Shirgazina', 'Call:', '603-814-9056', 'Please mention reference #', '171523', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
